attributes.action: Let kids dye there hair and get rid of mandatory school uniform
attributes.additional_details:
Some kids can't afford the uniform and have to get used second hand ones that may be broken already , also the pockets on blazers rip of all to easy there cheaply made and god awful.

Dying your hair is not a destructive and should not be treated as such.
attributes.background: Let us wear normal clothes and not school uniform not all kids can buy the school uniform as it costs £100 or more for a full set. Dying hair is not a destruction and should not be treated as such.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/628871
